Hi Jim, thanks for that, do you know what they were asking for them by 
any chance ?.

Rich

Jim Gilbert wrote:

> Rich,
> There was a set of Wakayama's Toso Kodogu Koza for sale at this year's 
> San Francisco show, although it was not out on a table.  It's not 
> exactly rare, but not too commonly available in the US at least.
>
> I think that only volume 6 of Sato's set is hard to come by.  Anyway, 
> you did very well.
>
> Jim 
>
